titleStmt.title: Site Index of Named Entities in Bocaccio's Decameron
titleStmt.author: Obdurodon (Pittsburgh) Decameron Project Team
Newtfire (Greeensburg) Decameron Project Team

publicationStmt.p: This is part of a digital edition repurposed by Jessica Milewski, Matthew Burch, Lauren McGuigan, and Megan Mills of Pitt-Greensburg Digital Humanities class of Spring 2015 from Women of Boccaccioâ€™s Decameron project, 2014, a project by Mia Bencivenga and Karla Lopez.
The conversion and repurposing is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.
Elisa Beshero-Bondar transformed an XML of the English text produced by Bencivenga and Lopez into TEI P5, 15 March 2016.

sourceDesc.p: data compiled by Oakland project team in 2014.

place.placeName: fonte di marmo bianchissimo (III.in) messe le tavole intorno alla bella fonte (III.con) nella maniera usata vicini alla bella fonte (IV.in) tutti raccolti, come usati erano, appresso della bella fonte (IV.con) intorno della bella fontana di presente furono in sul danzare (VII.con) appresso la bella fontana a seder posti (VIII.in) dintorno alla chiara fonte (X.in)
